definitions.title: subst.,
definitions.body: purpose, intention, but always used as

definitions.title: conj.,
definitions.body: on account of, because (for [[יַעֲנֶה]], of the form [[יִחְהָר]] etc., Sta:§ 259 Kö:ii. 403; cf. 9anay mean, intend):—

definitions.title: prep.,
definitions.body: rarely with a subst., † Ez Eze 5:9 [[יַעַן תּוֹעֲבוֹתֵיכֶם]], Hag 1:9 [[יַעַן מָה]], v:Hag 1:9 [[יַעַן בֵּיתִי]]; with a ptcp. Ez Eze 36:13 [[יען אמרים]] because of men saying to you (but rd. prob. [[אָמְרָם]], Co Toy Berthol); freq. with inf. c., 1Ki 21:20 [[יַעַן הִתְמַכֶּרְְ]] on account of thy having sold thyself, Am 5:11, Is 30:12, Is 37:29 (= 2Ki 19:28) [[יַעֵן הִתְרַגֶּזְ ְאֵלַי]], Je 5:14, Je 7:13, Je 23:38, Je 48:7, and oft.. (c. 18 t.) in Ezek., as Eze 5:7 (rd. [[יַעַן הַמְרֽׂתְכֶם]]), Eze 13:8, Eze 13:22, Eze 25:3, Eze 25:6, Eze 25:8, Eze 25:12.

[[יַעַן וּבְיַעַן]], q.d. because and by the cause (that), sq. perh., Le 26:43 (H) [[יען וביען בְּמִשְׁפָּטַי]] [[מָêָאסוּ]], Ez Eze 13:10; [[יַעַן בְּיַעַז]] sq. inf., Ez Eze 36:3. (In all, reckoning [[ביען]]([[ו]])[[יען ]] once each, 93 t., of which 20 are in 1-2 K, II in Je, 38 in Ez; and only 9 in Gn–2 S.)
